message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but my turn comes with a cost for both of us due to inflation. This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Inflation hurts me more, so I'll take a bit more to compensate
This is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly before inflation eats away at the value any further. A 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
